description: When I first used this ap it worked fine but that was on previous versions of the OS. My current version (22.04) it doesn't work at all and actually over several versions it has been unreliable. Much as I would like to have it as I used to like the way it worked I am afraid that since it rarely opens a CD and will never encode one or gives me the "Not Responding" message I feel that I have to look elsewhere.
Tried it on Ubuntu 18.04.3 to convert audio to mp3. Worked perfectly and it seems to have many other useful conversion options.

Converts audio CD's to mp3 files without problems and very fast.
Tried Asunder (didn't create anything) and Sound Juicer (only created ogg files) but fre:ac just works (even this beta version)
summary: Works very well with Ubuntu 18.04 lts

description:
An excellent App; once I worked out the correct procedure:

1. Set to rip automatically upon inserting CD.
2. Start app.
3. Insert CD.
4. Wait while CD is read and app crashes.
5. restart app.
6. reinsert CD!!
summary: does what I need perfectly (ripping CDs to FLAC files)

description: I want to rip audio cd'd and for this it works very well. Easy to use
No good for me P.O.S all apps though snap downloads half way and stops wont install on Ubuntu 19.04

i've tried a few similar apps but i this one is my favourite.
easy to use and understand the functions.
summary: i would highly recommend this one!

description: Errors out and can't access directories. Reports Permission Denied

I love that this app is available on several platforms, not only because it means I get to use the same app everywhere, but because it's proven itself a stable and convenient app with lots of options for audio import.
summary: Many audio formats, easy to use, stable

description:
It was able to convert a 23gb MP4 to a MP3 (just audio), the final mp3 file was 111mb.
Thanks
summary: It works very well for my first convertion (Linux Mint 19 Cinnamon)

description: I use it to convert .mp4 to .mp3 . So far it is quick, and completes the conversions successfully.
Allows very flexible control of encoding and filenaming. Very easy to use - I was up and running in 3 minutes. I like it quite a bit better than ripping with itunes.
The UI might be a bit dated but it works flawlessly for encoding CDs to FLAC files.

Easy to use and setup.
Very flexible . many options to optimize to fit your needs.
comes with built-in standard encoder no need to install any add-ons.
Works like a charm

Everything just works and there are lots of options from encoding format to tag editing and CDDB integration. Wish I had found this earlier instead of battling with some of the other rippers on Linux that have not been maintained.
Locks up UBUNTU 18.04 - Looks like it could be a nice program but can't use.
Gets the job done
It gets the job done, I am using it to converty my CD collection to FLAC.
summary: Simple to use and works great

description: I tried several rippers, and this is the first one that actually functioned, and didn't crash. Lot's of options (almost too many), and fast. Very nice!

Works great, and very simple. I'm ripping about 200 CDs from my collection and going great. There are a lot of verification errors, but I don't know what this means as all the error-tracks play fine, so I'm not worried when I see them.

It's a great product, very much like Winamp was in the early days.

If you want to convert your CD's to MP3's or similar, I highly recommend this as I have converted over 100 of mine.

I was using dbpoweramp for years (before I became a daily Linux user) and then the (iTunes) AAC encoding stopped working. Not only does fre:ac work like a charm with all the codecs, there's no need to go into Windows to use it (although it works there equally well). It's an excellent product.
Installed via software centre on ubuntu 21.10 and doesn't start.

Sofar its a good wav cd ripper it looks nice and compleet in its dark mode it has also drive read speed setting and the wav rip result sounds pretty good to me , it beats many other top cd rippers in audio quality i might even prefer the audio wav output files over EAC cd ripper If you are looking for a cd ripper you should def give freac a try sofar i dont see a jitter setting or acurip but for the rest it has it all including cd track info

Perfect for ripping, encoding. Ripped 1400 CD's, Metadata almost allways acurate. Now using to encode Flac to MP3. With a little bit of manipulation( No coding) I am easily able to organize My CD/FLAC/MP3 collection. I highly Recommend this program if you have a good sized CD collection. Has a lot of other functions also.
summary: Highly Recommended if you have a Big CD Collection

description: Might be because I'm using fractional scaling on one of my monitors, but on the FHD monitor that's at 100% scaling, the UI window does not fit and can't be used; on the HDPI one at 175% scaling, it's even bigger!!
summary: UI too big for my screen - unusable

description: Ubuntu 22.04 just works so perfectly every time.

It's a great tool WHEN it works. Problem is it crashes a lot when trying to read a list of files.

I found the best option is to keep just a few in a directory, and convert them then move them, but still I find I have to reboot every once in a while.
The app window is too large for my 12 inch notebook with 1366x768 screen. and the window cannot be resized. That's what I call bad UI design.
Ubuntu 20.04 - Just try to load opus file to convert it into mp3 - does not detect type of file. So that was all what I need to do, but it doesn`tt work for me. Have to remove.
summary: Even does not recognize opus file type (v1.1.7 on Ubuntu 20.04)

description: I've been using Fre:ac for years. It's my favorite cd music ripper. Excellent quality software. Good job Mr. Kauscher.
This WAS the most linux ripper out there, very configurable, details, etc. but now it can barely rip a CD without crashing. Sad.
summary: Not as stable as it used to be

description: Installed on 22.04LTS. Easy install, easily converted CD tracks to MP3. It found the track titles, chose the correct settings (VBR), put the music in the ordinary place. It just WORKS. I have to admit that I haven't used it extensively, but I had zero problems with this basic CD ripping operation. A pleasure to find this!
summary: Great app, would definitely recommend giving it a try

description: oben ist alles gesagt
Läuft sauber & innovative Bedienung
es tut das was es verspricht
summary: Ich mag das Programm es das tut was es verspricht

description: Das perfekte Tool zum Rippen und konvertieren von Audio-CDs!
Funktioniert, Datenbankanbindung, verschiedenste Codecs...
Does what it should. Perfectly fits my needs.
Bietet viele Möglichkeiten, ist übersichtlich, arbeitet schnell und stabil.

Also das Tool ist rundherum gelungen... So wie ich es früher unter Windoof gewohnt war kann ich meine Musik nun blitzschnell digitalisieren. Dieses Programm ist zwar nicht neu aber ich kannte es bisher leider nicht.
nachedem ich eine ripper gestestet habe, gefllt mir diese ganz gut. und vor allem läuft er ohne fehle bis jetzt
Das Pgm finde ich gut! Aber die Angabe mit den 19,9 MB muss ein Schreibfehler sein. Bei der gerade eben erfolgte Installatione wurden ~ 380 MB herunter geladen!!
Arbeitet als Snap zuverlässig. Nutze das Programm schon seit Jahren, auch unter Windows. Immer problemlos.
El Programa es muy bueno, por que tiene el editor del tag y el convertido de cualquier tipo de audio.
Se cierra al querer cargar los archivos
Incluye todo lo necesario para rippear y convertir. Cumple con las espectativas.
Es lo que necesitaba. Convierte archivos de audio y permite la edición de tags al mismo tiempo.
Lo estoy probando

SE: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64 bits

Parfait, convertit par exemple un album FLAC en un album MP3.
affiche des carrés dans tous les menus à la place des caractères
Après avoir essayé plusieurs applications dont sound juicer, c'est avec celle-ci que j'ai les meilleurs identification de morceaux de musique ^^

remplace bien flacon qui ne fonctionne plus depuis l'installation d'ubuntu 22.4.
parfois un peu instable , donne un message d'erreur mais en fait fonctionne quand même.
Не запустилась.

Интерфейс появляется. При попытке добавить музыку, вылетает.
Ubuntu 18.04.2
Запускается и конвертирует большой список музыкальных файлов в другой нужный формат, без проблем. Есть все нужные настройки и русский язык.
